welcome to knny.io

[click the star]


Hi, I'm KNNY, an artist. My work mostly deals with topics around the self and enlightenment. My most recent series titled “Light Beings” features materialized consciousness as someone who is looking for the all-encompassing purpose of life while entering different dimensions of reality. I mix this light being philosophy with 3D buildings and code - it's hard to describe what I do unless you see it.


Below is the navigation which hosts a bunch of links to my artwork/collabs/buildings in the metaverse, my self-deployed NFT store, a gallery and other cool shit.

Make yourself at home.


> NFT Store

Decentralized, open-source NFT marketplace, specifically for KNNY's work.
